name: Paranormal Coffee
description:
*If you are on a Mac the game might run laggy, especially at the fortune telling part where there is a heavy particle system. 

Paranormal Coffee is a point and click tasting simulation game and a digital fortune teller. The mini game demonstrates the cultural phenomena of flipping the cup after drinking the Turkish coffee for reading one's fortune from the coffee grounds. The game is developed for introducing this exotic coffee culture to the people who are not familiar with it. It aims to create a mouth watering affect on the player and make them curious about the actual physical experience. 

After you play thorough the tasting, you will be rewarded with a short personal note, if you choose and click on one of the appearing silhouettes at the fortune telling part. 

Please make sure to keep the sound on; the game has music and sound effects. Enjoy!
